
cache
=====

These are cache entities....

**Entities**

 * :doc:`PoC.cache.par <cache_par>` Cache with parallel tag-unit and
   data memory (using infered memory).
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.tagunit_par <cache_tagunit_par>` Tag-Unit with
   parallel tag comparison.
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.tagunit_seq <cache_tagunit_seq>` Tag-Unit with
   sequential tag comparison.

   cache_replacement_policy
   cache_tagunit_par
   cache_tagunit_seq
